create table ${tableName} as select * from zd_language
mapper.delete: DELETE zd_language FROM zd_language INNER JOIN (SELECT chinese, sqbm, MAX(updated_at) AS maxupdated_at, MAX(ID) AS maxidformaxupdated_at, COUNT(1) FROM zd_language GROUP BY chinese HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) AS duplicates ON zd_language.chinese = duplicates.chinese WHERE zd_language.updated_at != duplicates.maxupdated_at OR (zd_language.updated_at = duplicates.maxupdated_at AND zd_language.ID != duplicates.maxidformaxupdated_at);
